NP_H1 Forward 1.5 primer Hamming Distances 
```{r}
NP_H1_F <-read.csv("hamming_distance_results/NP_H1_NP_Forward_1.5_results.csv")

NP_H1_1 <- NP_H1_F[-c(2963),]

barplot(table(NP_H1_1$hamming_distance), xlab = "Hamming Distance", ylab = "Number of Sequences", ylim = c(0,2500))
```
